TopicTitle: Mountains lit on the night side

Articles.Content:
Is there any way to make the mountains near the terminator stay dark? they seem to be prematurely lit by the sun. I have the Scaterer and EVE mod.

 

The night side should be pitch black, but as you can see. They're Lit up even before the sunlight touches it.

 

https://gyazo.com/ade2a027e264b949c2a3c3dd0eede49f
Try turning on 'celestial bodies cast self-shadows', that might resolve it. You could also try turning down ambient light boost as this will reduce the brightness of terrain in the dark.
